summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Sixth Avenue Northwest from W. 45th Street to W. 55th Street et al in the City of Seattle, by grading & curbing under Ordinance No. 15792, creating Local Improvement District No. 1471 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
